posts.post_title: Raw T206 HOFer and Southern Leaguer For Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Drouillard
Hello Everyone,

I have a couple of T206s that I would like to sell or trade. 

Piedmont 150 HOFer Rube Waddell Throwing, Creases at the top, rounded corners, no paper loss, nicely centered, $75.00 delivered.SOLD
Old Mill Southern League George Paige, No creases, no paper loss, Sharp looking card except a tad short in length, probably trimmed along the top, $55.00 delivered.SOLD
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/001-78.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/002-73.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/003-74.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/004-65.jpg[/IMG]

First email that says I'll take them gets them.

Thanks,

Joe
